title: Q25 Revision KoL MC
prompt: Which revision of the sentence is the <u>most</u> concise and effective?
description:
Read this sentence.

I have participated in many community art projects, including designing the painted mural which is outside the gymnasium at Mead Elementary School.
feedback: The correct answer is: “I have participated in many community art projects, including designing the mural outside the gymnasium at Mead Elementary School.” The other options are more wordy without adding anything to the sentence. It isn’t necessary to say that a mural is painted because most murals are painted.  The most concise phrase is “the mural outside the gymnasium.”
